work-item.field:
• Open document in Polarion and select "Import Changes"


  • Browse for updated file, select appropriate options and import it



Overwrite Conflicts: If document was changed in the meantime, those changes will be ignored and overwritten.
Import Comments Only: Only comments will be imported all other changes in the Word document will be ignored.
Defining collaboration rules at the beginning with the stakeholder can save you a lot of time.
You can define workflow rules which make some fields read only based on the status of a workitem.
